summary: Sound replacer for the horse whistle mod by DarkenDe
descriptionHtml:
[img] http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/7699-1-1329525715.jpg [/img]

[color=#4ea2e5] _______________________________________________________________________________ [/color]

[b] [color=#4ea2e5] Psychosteve's Horse whistle sound [/color][/b] [b] | V 1.0 [/b]
[color=#4ea2e5] _______________________________________________________________________________ [/color]


[b] [color=#e0530d]THIS MOD IS OUT OF DATE AND NO LONGER UPDATED[/color] [/b]


Just a simple sound replacer i've made for the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5528 target="_blank"] Horse Whistle - Running Horse[/url] mod

by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=1408499 target="_blank"] DarkenDe[/url]. The sound is less loud than the original one and in a better quality.

Watch the video for more details !


A [b] [color=#fbaf37] BIG THANKS [/color] [/b] to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=1408499 target="_blank"] DarkenDe[/url] for letting me upload his original mod to give him some time to

make a better version !


Enjoy !!




[b] [color=#fbaf37] Install [/color] [/b]
[color=#fbaf37] _______________________________________________________________________________ [/color]

[list]
[*] Use [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/content/modmanager/ target="_blank"] Nexus Mod Manager[/url] and follow the steps

[b] [color=#fbaf37]OR[/color] [/b]

[*] Extract manually [color=#ffe292] whistle.wav [/color] into your [color=#ffe292] data/sound/fx [/color] folder
[/list]


For [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=1408499 target="_blank"] DarkenDe[/url]'s original mod users :

[list]
[*] Install the latest [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8221 target="_blank"] Script Dragon[/url]

[*] Extract [color=#ffe292] HorseWhistleFAST.asi [/color] and [color=#ffe292] HorseWhistleFAST.ini [/color] into your [color=#ffe292] Skyrim [/color] game folder

[*] Edit [color=#ffe292] HorseWhistleFAST.ini [/color] to customise your control keys
[/list]



[b] [color=#fbaf37] Playing with the original mod [/color] [/b]
[color=#fbaf37] _______________________________________________________________________________ [/color]


Basicly this mod allows you to call or / and summon your horse when is away. After the whistle

sound the horse will run to you.

After you've installed all files you will have to customize your keys with [color=#ffe292] HorseWhistleFAST.ini [/color]

and the key list at the end of the file :

[list]
[*] [color=#ffe292][main] keySpawn=[/color] is the key to automaticly summon your horse next to you

[*] [color=#ffe292][main] keyWhistle=[/color] is the key to call your horse when is around

[*] [color=#ffe292][HorseSpeed] SpeedMultNormal=[/color] let you change the general speed of the horse

[*] [color=#ffe292][HorseSpeed] SpeedMultPathing=[/color] let you change the runing speed of the horse when called

[*] [color=#ffe292][HorseAutoMount] On=1[/color] let you automont your horse after calling it (he will run next to you

and your character will mount it)... put [color=#ffe292][HorseAutoMount] On=0[/color] to disable this option
[/list]



[b] [color=#fbaf37] Uninstall [/color] [/b]
[color=#fbaf37] _______________________________________________________________________________ [/color]

[list]
[*] Just delete [color=#ffe292] whistle.wav [/color] placed in [color=#ffe292] data/sound/fx [/color]
[/list]



[b][color=#fbaf37]Credits[/color][/b]
[color=#fbaf37] _______________________________________________________________________________ [/color]


Thanks to DarkenDe for the original mod :
[list]
[*] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5528 target="_blank"] Horse Whistle - Running Horse[/url]
[/list]



[b] [color=#fbaf37] Want more ? [/color] [/b]
[color=#fbaf37] _______________________________________________________________________________ [/color]


Don't forget to check out my other mods :

[list]
[*] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4707 target="_blank"] Psychosteve's DragonPriest Masks [/url]

[*] [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6538 target="_blank"] Psychosteve's Golden God's Shrines [/url]

[*] [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4640 target="_blank"] Psychosteve's Stone of Barenziah [/url]

[*] [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5763 target="_blank"] Psychosteve's Bust of the Gray Fox [/url]

[*] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9868 target="_blank"] Psychosteve's Custom Realistic Lighting [/url]

[*] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11010 target="_blank"] Psychosteve's SkyUI icon Set [/url]
[/list]
